website_summaries.verdict: This Banana Boat Deep Tanning spray is infused with argan oil to make your skin feel soft and smooth.
pros: protects against aging and skin damage
Perfect for quick and easy coverage while on vacation
cons: Low SPF doesn't protect your skin very much from the sun

customer_reviews.title: Great, great product
customer_reviews.text: This IS best best sun tan lotion (spray) I’ve ever used. I will apply this just before exposure and not once have I been burnt. It’s a little oily, as expected, but really does a great job. It’s a shame they don’t make it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for giving a good color when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for giving a good color when you know you are not going to be in the sun for a long time. If you burn easily, don't use this as you will need something with a higher protection level, but if you want color and know you are not going to be in the sun a long time, this is perfect. My go to product...light, not sticky and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Ordered again
customer_reviews.text: I have already ordered 2 more! If you want to tan and have little protection this is great! I took it to the Beach and I did not burn!
customer_reviews.author: LynnePugh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sun Bathing
customer_reviews.text: Works great when you need a light SPF for tanning.Not greasy,pleasant fragrance and has dry oils to keep skin moisturized while sun bathing.Is a clear spray on.
customer_reviews.author: jjjohn

customer_reviews.title: Not to heavy of a spray,
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spray. It is not heavy feeling and sprays on evenly. I spray this several times during the day when I'm out and it leaves skin moisturized afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and love the smell and I love the spray on
customer_reviews.author: SuFun

customer_reviews.title: ... can put on clothes after application and not feel like sausage on a griddle
customer_reviews.text: You can put on clothes after application and not feel like sausage on a griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Horner

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I took this on vacation to Punta Cana in January. With application every couple of hours, it worked great. I have very light skin and I didn't burn but came back with a great tan. I also use coconut oil after showers, etc. to make sure that my skin stays very hydrated especially when on vacation and while I am in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Tanning Spray
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning product for those of us that do not need a bazillion ELF coverage. Sprays on evenly and I have found that dry oil rocks!
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Sun bathing happy
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. My most favorite sunscreen. The spray can is so convenient for one person application. I spend most day out doors or at my pool and have never burn. It smells amazing and sets quickly. I was so glad when I found the banana boat product because you get the results of oil in a dry silky application.
customer_reviews.author: Donnetta

customer_reviews.title: Tan
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of suntan spray. I get a great tan from it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't been using it for that long and I'm getting a good tan even before summer is hear
customer_reviews.text: This really does enhance tanning. I haven't been using it for that long and I'm getting a good tan even before summer is hear. Not some kind of dye either.
customer_reviews.author: Dale D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not need to wear sunscreen for I don't usually ever burn. This is great bc I feel like I'm getting a little protection but that it amplifies that deep brown color. Non greasy, easy to spray... Def my fav!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Light spray sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep your skin safe & soft, while helping you to tan. Love this light spray sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Pillowtalk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this in stores but by far my favorite product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this before and as always it's really good
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Skin Rash
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for two summers, however, this time I had a terrible reaction to this product. My shoulders broke out in tiny water blisters and my arms and legs broke out in an itchy rash. I do not have sensitive skin and I do not have a sensitivity to the sun. Its too bad, I just bought to bottles because I used to love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: jody pegorari

product_meta.title: Banana Boat UltraMist Deep Tanning Dry Oil Continuous Clear Spray SPF 4 Sunscreen, 6 oz

Stunning Tan from Any Angle 

This sheer, lightweight formula can be applied at any angle - even upside down! Made with coconut and grape seed oils, this Deep Tanning Dry Oil SPF 4 Continuous Clear Spray with AvoTriplex® technology is your ticket to paradise. 

• Fast & Even Coverage 
• Very water resistant 
• Also available in SPF 8 
• New! Easy Grip 6 fl oz spray can 
• New! Twist n Lock Spray, No Cap!
